question: Jagannath Yatra festival was celebrated in ___________.
explanation: Jagannath Yatra festival or Ratha Yatra is a Hindu festival associated with Lord Jagannath held at Puri in the state of Odisha, India. The 5000 year old chariot festival marks the return of Lord Krishna to Vrindavan with his brother Balabhadra and sister Subhadra. Whereas the 135th JagannathYatra starts from June 25 and ends on July 3 2017.
